channel.title: The "take" option won't work...help please
channel.description:
My server was working fine before, i'm not sure what I did to it, but now whenever i pick up a item using the "take" option, the item just dissapears... :confused:
[b]> its not in my inventory > and its not on the floor after I "take" it > theres no compiler errors >::pickup works just fine[/b]
Please help...really aprreciate it :(
[glow=red,2,300]Rep++[/glow] if you can fix

item.title: The "take" option won't work...help please
item.dc:creator: @csrsniper254 csrsniper254
item.description:
@csrsniper254 wrote:

I need two things.
#1: What source you are using.
#2: What was the last thing you edited before this happened?

Read full topic
